sense.def:
A quotation
je stavek ali besedna zveza iz neke knjige, pesmi ali igre.

seg.quote: ...a quotation from a novel by Somerset Maugham.

sense.def:
To give someone a quotation
pomeni, da tistemu človeku povemo, koliko mu bomo računali za določeno delo.

seg.quote: They submitted quotations and agreed prices.
